org.openbel.framework.core.cache
Interface CacheManagerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultCacheManagerService
public interface CacheManagerService

CacheManagerService defines a service for managing the framework cache.

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Method Summary
 void purgeResources()
          Purges all cached files from the cache directory located at SystemConfiguration.getCacheDirectory().
 void updateResourceInCache(ResourceType type, String location)
          Updates a single resource in the cache identified by it's String location.
 void updateResourceIndexInCache(Index index)
          Updates all resources identified in the resource index.
 

Method Detail

purgeResources

void purgeResources()
                    throws IOException
Purges all cached files from the cache directory located at SystemConfiguration.getCacheDirectory().

:-(*)

Throws:
IOException - Thrown if IO errors occurred purging the cache

updateResourceInCache

void updateResourceInCache(ResourceType type,
                           String location)
Updates a single resource in the cache identified by it's String location. The type ResourceType must also be provided in order to identify where it should live in the cache.

Parameters:
type - ResourceType, the resource type
location - String, the resource location

updateResourceIndexInCache

void updateResourceIndexInCache(Index index)
Updates all resources identified in the resource index.

Parameters:
index - Index, the resource index to update resources from
